wiktionary_senses.definition: An adult female owner of a pet.
To care for in a motherly way.
prefix of a female commoner who marries a royal prince.
Initialism of month-over-month/month-on-month; compared to the same time period in the previous month.
Initialism of middle of the market.
Initialism of message-oriented middleware, hardware or software infrastructure supporting sending and receiving of messages between distributed systems.
Initialism of motive, opportunity, means (“factors to consider in investigating a crime”).
